name: Poker (itch)
description:
Texas Poker is a texas hold 'em game featuring an immersive online poker experience!

After you buy in with 1 big blind and 1 small blind bet you will play 6 rounds of poker with 6 other players!

This is free to play and uses fake coins for fun!

Try it out :)

More games like this can be found  at  Lucky Lion!
